Name: Kentucky Buck
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice wheel and strawberry slice.
MUDDLE strawberry in base of shaker.
Add next 4 ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir.
Garnish with lemon and strawberry slices.
Review: A tall, strawberry influenced bourbon sour with a subtle spicy hint of ginger.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2009 by Erick Castro at Bourbon & Branch , San Francisco, USA.
